metadata.description: FDA regulatory tools for medical device analysis, predicate extraction, and submission preparation. v5.28.0 adds TICKET-004: Multi-pathway Pre-Sub support (510k, PMA, IDE, De Novo) with pathway-specific templates, 55+ question bank, and auto-detection. v5.27.0 completes TICKET-001: Pre-Sub eSTAR/PreSTAR XML. v5.26.0 adds automated data updates and section comparison.

plugins.name: fda-tools
plugins.description: AI-powered FDA regulatory assistant with 51 commands, 12 agents â€” NEW v5.28.0: TICKET-004 Multi-Pathway Pre-Sub (510k, PMA, IDE, De Novo) with pathway-specific templates, 55+ question bank v2.0, auto-detection, and pathway-aware PreSTAR XML | v5.27.0: Pre-Sub eSTAR/PreSTAR XML complete (15/15 tests) | v5.26.0: Automated data updates and section comparison | v5.25.0: PreSTAR XML with 6 meeting types | v5.23.0: AI-powered standards generation | Core features: predicate extraction, substantial equivalence analysis, submission drafting, FDA review simulation, safety surveillance, guidance lookup, standards generation, and full eSTAR/PreSTAR export | Agent-based architecture uses installing user's Claude Code access
